summary: Wendigo in a Meat Locker [ plot ]
title: Wendigo in a Meat Locker [ plot ]
body:
Leaving the tavern was an easy feat, but getting the man to stay and talk was a different story entirely. Anthony … well… he thought it would be as easy as opening a door.

Anthony was used to chasing prey, but this man was not prey. Or at least, he sure hoped he wasn’t. He quickly took off after him, though, stumbling on two legs when he was used to four.

The man turned, if only for a moment. Anthony was full of hope. Did he hear him right…? Was he going to be a nice man?

If only it was so simple.

The weight of the watermelon impacted Anthony’s stomach, causing him to stop in his tracks to recover from the blow. He dropped to his knees in the hot dirt road.

The shopkeeper seemed quite a bit kinder than the Gothitelle, though, hustling down to the road to help…

Meanwhile… Down the road …

The Exorcist sighed calmly, pulling a talisman from her sleeve. 

“I should go. That person needs help…”

> THE EXORCIST IS AVAILABLE FOR QUESTIONS AGAIN!

The man turned, if only for a moment. Anthony was full of hope. Did he hear him right…? Was he going to be a nice man?

If only it was so simple.

The weight of the watermelon impacted Anthony’s stomach, causing him to stop in his tracks to recover from the blow. He dropped to his knees in the hot dirt road.

Meanwhile… Down the road …

title: Slakoth - 287
body:
Slakoth’s heart beats just once a minute. Whatever happens, it is content to loaf around motionless. It is rare to see this Pokemon in motion.

- Pokemon Alpha Sapphire

blog.name: rex-shadao
blog.title: Of Art, Pokémon, Nintendo, Star Wars, Etc...
blog.description: On Nintendo Network (and formerly Miiverse), Pokémon forums and various other websites, I am simply known as Shadao. I tend to write a lot of things regarding to Pokémon and any Nintendo-related stuff, as well as other franchises like Star Wars. I like to make artworks in my spare time, and I hope they'll find an audience here on this social network.  I also like Splatoon 2 alot.

tags: ill reblog this and post the rest
summary:
Soooooooooooooooooooooooo.......................................... im having a pretty weird day.
I decided to have a look in...
body:
Soooooooooooooooooooooooo…………………………………… im having a pretty weird day.

I decided to have a look in cex for any second hand pokemon games that I don’t have and haven’t played. The only one that was there was pokemon white 2 so I just took it.

Usually when I get a second hand pokemon game, the ot hasn’t gotten very far but this was… definitely a surprise holy shit.

I start up the game and find out the ot has completed the game (has collected all 8 badges) so I decide to check the pc and uuuhhhhhhhhhhhh….

I discover these (and these aren’t even all of pokemon).

They’re probably hacked but tbh idc. I won’t battle with them and I’ll probs just keep them as a ‘hehe look what I have’ but……… I’m pretty shook.

blog.name: gingykfox
blog.title: Gingy's Art Blog
blog.description: I draw stuff. Mostly Pokemon like Braixen. But every once in a while I draw other stuff.

summary:
Pokemon - Silvally 
Was out with family and decided to draw, so I grew a Silvally head-shot 
and colored it when I got home...
caption:
Pokemon - Silvally

Was out with family and decided to draw, so I grew a Silvally head-shot and colored it when I got home cause I thought it looked ok enough. Also wanted to test out my printer’s scanner function. Looks pretty good to me. ^^

reblog.comment:
